comments: I had Watson online and my one complaint is, he never responds to your emails and if he does, its two weeks later when your question is irrelevant. The actual work for the course isnt bad and its easy to receive an A. The most work you do is for the final, writing 4 2 page paper on different topics you get to choose. Overall, its not terrible.

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  GET READY TO READ  TEST HEAVY
comments: I took this class online, maybe that\'s not where he\'s suited. Never responded to any email I sent (3 of them) over the semester, little to no communication via blackboard simply assigns multiple choice test per chapter EVERY week. Assigned 4 essay papers due at end of semester w/NO guide other than a topic out of the text, grades w/NO feedback.

comments: PLEASE AVOID CLASSES WITH THIS TEACHER. Professor does not regularly respond to email communication (takes 1+ weeks). Take class from a different prof!!

comments: I made a good grade in the class, but I really didn\'t think he was a good teacher. I though he was incredibly condescending and a bit rude at times. He\'s been in psychology for years and has a lot of experience, but I just don\'t think the classroom is a great fit for him. To each his own, I suppose!
